name: Keepers of Grimoire TCG
blurb: Keepers of Grimoire Trading Card Game is a brand new, real life TCG in digital format, striving to incorporate the best of both worlds.

rewards.reward: No Reward

NOTE: All pledges include all previous rewards unless stated otherwise.\r\n \r\n(Guilty Pledger) Thank you for your pledge. Everyone at KoG loves you! You will have access to our Set 1 Beta and a special forum badge showing that you helped support KoG from the very beginning.

(Bronze Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Every backer at this level and higher will be invited to our forums with a bronze membership and receive $15 in-game currency for the official game. You are guaranteed to be one of the first players of the game!

(Early Bird Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Once the official game launches, you will receive a special Kickstarter-only in-game playing mat and sleeves. Also a total of $25 in-game currency. THIS TIER is NOT included in any other reward tier.

(Starter Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Includes five free card packs when the game launches, and an extra starter deck when you play the official game. You will receive a total of $15 in-game currency.

(The Collector Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Includes digital Collector\u2019s book. This PDF will be filled with all of Bear\u2019s Lore Journal entries from the first set, over 100 full color pages of concept art, original photos, developers bios, and more! You also receive a total of $25 in-game currency.
Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Includes a total of $70 in-game currency.

(T-shirt Friendly Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Every backer for this level and higher will be invited to our forums with a silver membership level. Includes a KoG Backer T-Shirt and a total of $100 in-game currency to start off your personal collection with a bang.

(Digital Pledge) Includes all -digital- rewards from previous tiers. This is a digital-only reward. Includes a special digital copy of the Keepers of Grimoire novel. This will also include a total of $125 in-game currency. This tier does NOT include the KoG backer T-shirt.
(Flashy Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Includes an original "KoG" poster, suitable for framing, the KoG Backer T-Shirt and a total of $125 in-game currency.

(Ultimate Digital Pledge) Includes all -digital- rewards from previous tiers. This is for members interested in strictly digital rewards. This tier does NOT include the poster OR the T-shirt. This tier will include $225 total in-game store credit.

(BFF Pledge) Does NOT include any rewards from previous tiers. SPECIAL REWARD TIER. This tier is for those interested in playing with friends! You will receive 2 Original "KoG" posters, 2 KoG Backer T-shirts. You will receive 2 accounts with the following items: $150 in-game currency, special playing mat, sleeves, 5 free card packs, 1 additional starting deck and an unique icon. You and a friend will receive a Silver membership. All this will be shipped free (within US) to 1 destination. Please add $20 to your pledge to send to two locations. This tier is NOT included in any other reward tiers.
(The Signature Pledge) Includes everything from the \u201cFlashy Pledge,\u201d but the poster will have autographs from the entire development team! Plus a total of $250 in-game store credit.

(Gold Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Every backer for this level and higher will be invited to our forums with a Gold membership level. Includes: Collector\u2019s edition hardcover book, Paperback KoG novel and KoG poster - ALL signed by the KoG Development Team. ALSO \u2013 You will be invited to BETA test ALL of our future sets, for the life of KoG TCG. You will receive a total of $500 in-game currency. We value your contributions and we wish to have as much interaction with you as possible!

(Picture Perfect Pledge) NO other rewards are incorporated into this tier. SPECIAL TIER! This pledge only will receive this art reward: One of our artists will draw you a CUSTOM ART PORTRAIT! This piece could POTENTIALLY become a card in the game. With supplied photographs and some additional input from you, a KoG artist will make an image in your likeness (please see disclosures). Please add $50 to the pledge and we will sign a print of the portrait that will be sent to you. Artwork will be completed in the order in which we receive these pledges. You will receive the gold membership with $250 in-game currency.
(Complete KoG Pledge) You will receive everything from the Gold Pledge and the Picture Perfect Pledge. This has a total of $500 in-game currency.

(Minion Creator Pledge) HELP NAME AND DESIGN A MINION CARD. YOU can help us design Keepers of Grimoire! We will send you a KoG character sheet to fill out for our design team. We will turn your personalized character design, with your name, class and race into a playing card. You will receive the first copy of this card (Please see disclosures). This pledge does NOT include the Picture perfect reward.

(World Designer Pledge) HELP DESIGN AN EQUIPMENT, GAMBIT OR TERRAIN card. Help us design KoG! Your personalized card will be used in the actual game (and you will be the first one to have this card). You can provide the Lore, look, and type of item (Please see disclosures). This pledge does NOT include the Picture perfect reward.

(Ultimate Backer Pledge) Every backer for this level and higher will be invited to our forums with the TOP-TIER Platinum membership level. We really want to thank you for your generous pledge in person. You and a friend will receive an INVITE TO THE KoG DEVELOPER LAUNCH PARTY. You can play a game with the developers AND get a sneak peek of our future projects and storyboards! (Please see disclosures) You will receive everything from the complete KoG pledge ($1000 reward tier) PLUS the Minion AND World creator pledges. We value your contributions and we wish to have as much interaction with you as possible!

(Bronze Statue Pledge) Includes all rewards from previous tiers. Includes a LIMITED EDITION BARAQEL. THIS is an EXCLUSIVE, FIRST EDITION BRONZE CAST STATUE. This will NEVER be made again and is truly priceless. This bronze cast statue is estimated to be twelve inches tall!
